article_title: NC insurance commissioner: Blue Cross likely to be fined ‘millions’ for IT woes
article_text:
Wayne Goodwin says Blue Cross malfunctions are ‘off the charts’

Department of Insurance expects to conclude investigation this month, announce findings late June

Blue Cross challenges Goodwin’s characterization of the problems

article_metadata.title: NC insurance commissioner: Blue Cross likely to be fined ‘millions’ for IT woes | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: N.C. Insurance Commissioner Wayne Goodwin said Wednesday he expects to issue a fine against Blue Cross and Blue Shield “in the millions of dollars” for ongoing technology problems that have botched coverage, billing and payments for thousands of customers and doctors in the past four months.
